org.deuce.transaction.tl2cm.cm.AbstractContentionManager

Packages that use AbstractContentionManager
org.deuce.transaction.tl2cm.cm   
 

Uses of AbstractContentionManager in org.deuce.transaction.tl2cm.cm
 

Subclasses of AbstractContentionManager in org.deuce.transaction.tl2cm.cm
 class Aggressive
          Aggressive contention manager.
 class BackoffCM
          Abstract class for all contention managers that perform back-off.
 class Karma
          The Karma contention manager resolves conflicts by comparing the priorities of the conflicting threads.
 class KarmaLockStealer
          The Karma contention manager resolves conflicts by comparing the priorities of the conflicting threads.
 class LockSkipper
           
 class Polite
          The Polite contention manager resolves conflicts by backing off and retrying the lock.
 class Polka
          The Polka contention manager combines the back-off capabilities of Polite and the priority-based resolution algorithm of Karma.
 class Suicide
          The Suicide contention manager always aborts the transaction of the current thread.
 class Timestamp
